title: Replace logo with uploaded QH monogram company logo

requirements.text: Use the uploaded QH monogram image as the site logo asset. Remove the black background so only the gold QH monogram is visible (transparent background), and save it as the primary logo file at frontend/public/assets/generated/qh-logo.png.
acceptanceCriteria: The QH monogram logo is saved at frontend/public/assets/generated/qh-logo.png with a transparent background.
The black background from the original upload is removed — only the gold monogram renders.
The Header component renders the new qh-logo.png in place of any previously generated or placeholder logo.
The logo displays correctly on the dark site background without a visible bounding box or background fill.
The Footer also uses the new qh-logo.png wherever a logo mark appears.

constraints: Do not alter frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or any file under frontend/src/components/ui.
Logo asset must be served as a static file from frontend/public/assets/generated — do not route it through the backend.
nonGoals: Redesigning any other visual elements or color tokens.
Changing the 'Quindore' brand name text in the header.

edits: Remove the solid black background, keeping only the gold QH monogram on a transparent background (ChatGPT Imbage Feb 26, 2026, 01_13_07 PM.png > qh-logo.dim_200x200.png)
